SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into info (`name`, association_id, title, page_title, begin_datetime, end_datetime, is_deleted, deleted_at, deleted_by, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{associationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update info set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, association_id = #{associationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_title = #{pageTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_datetime = #{beginDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_datetime = #{endDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_by = #{deletedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, association_id, title, page_title, begin_datetime, end_datetime, is_deleted, deleted_at, deleted_by, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by from info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
